title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When trying to create a JAR file using the JAR packager, the process fails and displays the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR file using the JAR packager, the process fails and shows the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
EB: The JAR packager should successfully create the JAR file without any error message related to unsaved editors.
SR:
1. Open a file and make changes without saving it.
2. Open the JAR packager for the corresponding project.
3. Enter the required information such as the path, destination, and name of the JAR packager.
4. Attempt to create the JAR file and observe for any error messages.
